QuestData.Title: The Field of Ferocity: Foe from the Volcano!
QuestData.Description:
One of the first volunteers for this competition hails from the Waking Shores. A big djaradin fellow, not quite as angry as his kin.
He just seems to enjoy the sport of fighting. Hey, that works for me.
QuestData.RewardText: What a show! I could feel sparks flying from here!
